mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sutda_comment (`no`, `order`, board_no, player_no, content) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(no)+1, 0) FROM sutda_comment c), 0, #{boardNo}, #{player.no}, #{content})
INSERT INTO sutda_comment (`no`, `order`, board_no, player_no, content) VALUES (#{no}, (SELECT MAX(`order`)+1 FROM sutda_comment c WHERE no = #{no}), #{boardNo}, #{player.no}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.no no, `order` orderNo, board_no boardNo, content, c.regdate regdate, p.no 'player.no', IFNULL(p.nickname 'player.nickname','탈퇴한 사용자') FROM sutda_comment c LEFT JOIN player p ON player_no = p.no WHERE c.no = #{no} ORDER BY `order` DESC

SELECT c.no no, `order` orderNo, board_no boardNo, content, c.regdate regdate, p.no 'player.no', p.nickname 'player.nickname', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sutda_comment WHERE `no`=c.no) replyCount FROM sutda_comment c JOIN player p ON player_no = p.no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.no DESC, `order` ASC LIMIT #{page.startContent}, #{page.contentCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sutda_comment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
